Package index

Overview

synthesisr synthesisr-package
synthesisr: Import, assemble, and deduplicate bibiliographic datasets

Import & Export

read_refs()
Import bibliographic search results
write_refs() write_bib() write_ris()
Export data to a bibliographic format
detect_parser() detect_delimiter() detect_lookup() detect_year()
Detect file formatting information
parse_bibtex() parse_csv() parse_tsv() parse_pubmed() parse_ris()
Parse bibliographic text in a variety of formats
clean_df() clean_authors() clean_colnames()
Clean a tibble or vector
code_lookup
Bibliographic code lookup for search results assembly

Formatting

summary(<bibliography>) print(<bibliography>) `[`(<bibliography>) c(<bibliography>) as.data.frame(<bibliography>) as.bibliography() as_tibble(<bibliography>)
bibliography-class
format_citation()
Format a citation
add_line_breaks()
Add line breaks to one or more strings

Deduplication

deduplicate()
Remove duplicates from a bibliographic data set
find_duplicates()
Detect duplicate values
extract_unique_references()
Remove duplicates from a bibliographic data set
review_duplicates()
Manually review potential duplicates
override_duplicates()
Manually override duplicates
fuzzdist() fuzz_m_ratio() fuzz_partial_ratio() fuzz_token_sort_ratio() fuzz_token_set_ratio()
Calculate similarity between two strings
string_osa() string_lv() string_dl() string_hamming() string_lcs() string_qgram() string_cosine() string_jaccard() string_jw() string_soundex()
Calculate similarity between two strings

Deprecated

merge_columns()
Bind two or more data frames with different columns
